name: Rooted in the Stars
description:
Updated release of our Global Game Jam 2023 (ROOTS) submission

Check out our original game jam release here: https://ethantho.itch.io/rooted-in-the-stars

Fly across the solar system, spreading life by connecting roots from your home world to other planets!

*Global leaderboard is only accessible through the Windows version, download it below!

CONTROLS:

Up Arrow: 

        Hold: accelerate forwards

        Double-tap: boost Forwards (uses more fuel)

Left Arrow: 

        Hold: burn left

        Double-tap: dodge left

Right Arrow: 

        Hold: turn right

        Double-tap: dodge right

Down Arrow:

        Double-tap: boost backwards

Left Shift: 

        Hold: slow down

Space bar:

        Hold for 1 second while next to planet: attach root

                This only works if you have a root attached to your ship.

If you don't, go over to a life-filled planet and hold space to get one.

Credits:
